SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT esba.EmailSendBccAccountID,esba.EmailID,esba.EmailBccAccountID,esba.EmailAccountID,esba.EmailSendBccAccountState,esba.EmailSendBccAccountCreateTime,esba.EmailSendBccAccountLastTime,esba.EmailSendBccAccountSendTime,esba.Result FROM emailsendbccaccount AS esba WHERE 1=1 <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountID=@@EmailSendBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailID=@@EmailID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailAccountID=@@EmailAccountID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountState=@@EmailSendBccAccountState@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountCreateTime=@@EmailSendBccAccountCreateTime@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountLastTime=@@EmailSendBccAccountLastTime@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountSendTime=@@EmailSendBccAccountSendTime@@%> <%= AND esba.Result=@@Result@@%>;

SELECT esba.EmailSendBccAccountID,esba.EmailID,esba.EmailBccAccountID,esba.EmailAccountID,esba.EmailSendBccAccountState,esba.EmailSendBccAccountCreateTime,esba.EmailSendBccAccountLastTime,esba.EmailSendBccAccountSendTime,esba.Result FROM emailsendbccaccount AS esba WHERE 1=1 <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountID=@@EmailSendBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailID=@@EmailID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailAccountID=@@EmailAccountID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountState=@@EmailSendBccAccountState@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountCreateTime=@@EmailSendBccAccountCreateTime@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountLastTime=@@EmailSendBccAccountLastTime@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountSendTime=@@EmailSendBccAccountSendTime@@%> <%= AND esba.Result=@@Result@@%> LIMIT <R%= @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM emailsendbccaccount AS esba WHERE 1=1 <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountID=@@EmailSendBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailID=@@EmailID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailAccountID=@@EmailAccountID@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountState=@@EmailSendBccAccountState@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountCreateTime=@@EmailSendBccAccountCreateTime@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountLastTime=@@EmailSendBccAccountLastTime@@%> <%= AND esba.EmailSendBccAccountSendTime=@@EmailSendBccAccountSendTime@@%> <%= AND esba.Result=@@Result@@%>;
